definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: His wise leadership brought the people through the war.
sentences.chinese: 他的英明领导使人民安全渡过战争关。

sentences.english: Ep667 - Kexin chooses Wenqiang as her boyfriend. Yingming is very angry. He vows to take revenge on both Sichuan and Wenqiang.
sentences.chinese: 可欣决定选择文强，英明即誓言向四川和文强报复。

sentences.english: Shixian and Wuji get the news and plan to expose Yingming's misdeed.
sentences.chinese: 世贤和戊己得到消息，准备揭发英明的罪行。

sentences.english: Ep694 - Shimin agrees to work for Yingming with more rewards compared with his supervisor.
sentences.chinese: 世民愿继续与英明合作，但要求更多报酬。

sentences.english: We forgot the principles and practices of wise leadership.
sentences.chinese: 我们忘记了英明领导的准则和实践。

sentences.english: All the happiness we have now maybe is due to his wise leadership.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在所有的幸福生活都是源于他的英明领导。

sentences.english: Ep697 - Shixian persuades Congmin not to do business with Yingming. Congmin states that he has plans of his own.
sentences.chinese: 世贤劝聪敏勿与英明做生意，但聪敏表示已有打算。

sentences.english: Zheng Yuqing was so honest and wise that people always praised him.
sentences.chinese: 郑余庆是那么的正直英明，人们都称赞他。

sentences.english: King Henry I (1068-1135) were a brave warrior but too wise.
sentences.chinese: 英格兰国王亨利一世勇敢而又英明。

sentences.english: Q. In refusing to select Ronaldinho, is Dunga being wise or just stubborn?
sentences.chinese: 不带罗纳尔迪尼奥去南非，邓加是英明呢还是顽固呢？

sentences.english: Knowing this was the season, the wise old deer called the two new leaders to him.
sentences.chinese: 知道现在正是收割期，英明的老鹿王叫来两个新鹿王。

sentences.english: King Henry I (1068-1135) was a brave  warrior but also wise.
sentences.chinese: 英格兰国王亨利一世勇敢而又英明。

sentences.english: Ep688 - Yingming fawns on Mingming's father as he plans to woo Mingming.
sentences.chinese: 英明百般讨好明明的父亲，希望他帮忙追求明明。

sentences.english: And McCain is over The middle-aged people, wise people.
sentences.chinese: 而麦凯恩是位已过中年的人，英明的人。

sentences.english: Let us thank God for this great deliverance and his mercies.
sentences.chinese: 让我们感谢上帝的英明和怜悯。

definition: enlightened sage/brilliant master (flattering words applied to ruler)
lit. deep plans and distant thoughts/to plan far ahead (idiom)
to have a high notion of one's duty/to be highly principled
to stand tall and see far (idiom); taking the long and broad view/acute foresight
to prophesy with supernatural accuracy (idiom)/to have an incredible foresight
to love the common people as one's own children (praise for a virtuous ruler)
to follow admonition as natural flow (idiom); to accept criticism or correction (even from one's inferiors)
